component.name: QmidiNet
component.summary: A MIDI Network Gateway via UDP/IP Multicast

description.p: QmidiNet is a MIDI network gateway application that sends and receives MIDI data (ALSA Sequencer and/or JACK MIDI) over the network, using UDP/IP multicast. Inspired by multimidicast (http\://llg.cubic.org/tools) and designed to be compatible with ipMIDI for Windows (http\://nerds.de).
